# Test that a flow works with string interpolation

main .
cmp stdout stdout.golden

-- main.cue --
package test

A: {
	input:  "foobar"
	output: string
}

B: {
	input:  "interpolated \(A.output)"
	output: string
}
-- stdout.golden --
[detected task at "A"]
[detected task at "B"]
TASKS
  ===> A: dependencies:
  ===> B: dependencies: A


PROCESSING "A"
  setting output for "A" to: "from A: foobar"
FILLED in A: {
	input:  "foobar"
	output: "from A: foobar"
}

PROCESSING "B"
  setting output for "B" to: "from B: interpolated from A: foobar"
FILLED in B: {
	input:  "interpolated from A: foobar"
	output: "from B: interpolated from A: foobar"
}



 === END RESULT ===
{
	A: {
		input:  "foobar"
		output: "from A: foobar"
	}
	B: {
		input:  "interpolated from A: foobar"
		output: "from B: interpolated from A: foobar"
	}
}
